abstract: A revamping is expected to take time to lift the company’s results.
snippet: A revamping is expected to take time to lift the company’s results.
lead_paragraph: SAN FRANCISCO — Cisco Systems managed to encourage investors Wednesday despite sliding quarterly profits and flat revenue growth, prompting a nearly 7 percent run-up in its shares during after-hours trading.

headline.main: Profit Slides on Soft Sales, but Cisco Stays Upbeat
headline.print_headline: Profit Slides On Soft Sales, But Cisco Stays Upbeat
